statements: SELECT * FROM Students
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Students
SELECT student_name, progress FROM Students WHERE progress > 50
SELECT student_id, student_name, achievements FROM Students ORDER BY student_id DESC
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE course_name = 'Mathematics'
SELECT * FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC, progress ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, course_name FROM Students WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT student_id, student_name, course_name, achievements FROM Students WHERE course_name = 'Math';
SELECT student_name, course_name, achievements FROM Students WHERE achievements IS NOT NULL ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE progress BETWEEN 30 AND 70 ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, progress FROM Students WHERE progress > 80;
SELECT student_name, achievements FROM Students WHERE student_id = 3;
SELECT reward_name, reward_points FROM Rewards ORDER BY reward_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT student_name, progress, reward_name FROM Students JOIN Rewards ON Students.student_id = Rewards.student_id;
SELECT student_name, progress FROM Students WHERE progress > 75 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, achievements FROM Students WHERE LENGTH(achievements) > 100 ORDER BY achievements DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id IN (SELECT student_id FROM Rewards WHERE reward_points > 50) ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT student_name, reward_name, reward_points FROM Students JOIN Rewards ON Students.student_id = Rewards.student_id WHERE reward_points < 50 ORDER BY student_name ASC, reward_points DESC;
SELECT student_name, progress, reward_name, reward_points FROM Students LEFT JOIN Rewards ON Students.student_id = Rewards.student_id ORDER BY student_name ASC, reward_points DESC, progress DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM Students;
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_credit FROM Courses;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_grade FROM Students WHERE student_grade > 80;
SELECT course_name, course_credit FROM Courses WHERE course_credit >= 3;
SELECT student_id, student_name, course_id, progress_percentage FROM StudentProgress WHERE progress_percentage < 50;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_grade > 80 ORDER BY student_name DESC;

SELECT student_name, course_name, progress_percentage FROM Students JOIN StudentProgress ON Students.student_id = StudentProgress.student_id JOIN Courses ON StudentProgress.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE progress_percentage >= 80;

SELECT student_name, student_grade, course_name FROM Students JOIN StudentProgress ON Students.student_id = StudentProgress.student_id JOIN Courses ON StudentProgress.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE course_credit = 3 ORDER BY student_grade DESC;

SELECT student_name, course_name, progress_percentage FROM Students LEFT JOIN StudentProgress ON Students.student_id = StudentProgress.student_id AND Students.student_grade < 70 LEFT JOIN Courses ON StudentProgress.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE progress_percentage IS NULL;

SELECT course_name, AVG(progress_percentage) AS average_progress FROM Courses JOIN StudentProgress ON Courses.course_id = StudentProgress.course_id GROUP BY course_name HAVING AVG(progress_percentage) > 70 ORDER BY average_progress DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Students WHERE birth_date = '2000-01-01';
SELECT course_id, course_name, start_date, end_date FROM Courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT assignment_name, due_date, score FROM Assignments ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM Grades WHERE student_id = 123 AND grade >= 90;
SELECT * FROM Courses WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM Students WHERE birth_date BETWEEN '2000-01-01' AND '2005-12-31';
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Courses WHERE instructor LIKE 'Dr.%';
SELECT assignment_name, due_date, score FROM Assignments WHERE score > 90 ORDER BY due_date ASC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM Grades WHERE course_id = 101 AND grade < 70 ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, student_level FROM Students;
SELECT course_name, course_description, course_duration FROM Courses;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM Enrollments;
SELECT student_id, grade, grade_date FROM Grades;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM Students WHERE student_level = 3;
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor_id FROM Courses WHERE course_duration > 10;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM Grades WHERE grade >= 3.5;
